function EP02_16()

    --.承-10【5月第3週】「幕間 アキラちゃんとリコちゃん」
    SaveData.Title = "幕間 アキラちゃんとリコちゃん"


    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav",0)

PLAY_SE("SEb019.wav")
    --//CG：LINE風画面（ミナトとリコの会話①）
    --吉　//CI
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI030a")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//SE：LINEの通知音
--PLAY_SE("SEb019.wav")
--WAIT(600)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0332.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hello, Riko-san. I’m Minato, the one you met during Yuriai Private Academy’s entrance exam." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0333.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "My sister Lira gave me your ID. I’m sorry I couldn’t properly greet you back then before we parted." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0138.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "Whoa. Minato-kun, you’re so stiff even on SNS. So serious... well, I guess that’s kinda cute though." ]])
    --//リラ

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0139.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "What should I reply... Ah, I know. I’ll tease you a bit." ]])
    --//リラ

    --//CG：LINE風画面（ミナトとリコの会話②）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI031a")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0140.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "Who are you? I don’t really know you, but aren’t you being a bit too familiar? I’m reporting you, okay?" ]])
    --//リラ

    -- MSG([[ -- 【Riko?】 -- "I’m reporting you, okay?" -- ]])
    --//CG：LINE風画面（ミナトとリコの会話③）
    PLAY_SE("SEb019.wav")
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI032a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//SE：LINEの通知音
--PLAY_SE("SEb019.wav")
--WAIT(600)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0334.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh!? Eh!? Could it be you have the wrong person!? Or you don’t remember!? Sorry for the sudden message!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0141.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "Hahaha! My stomach hurts! Minato-kun is the best!" ]])
    --//リラ

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0142.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "Of course I’ll say it’s a joke at the end, but I’ll tease you just a little more." ]])
    --//リラ

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0201.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Rikopin’s unusually cheerful today." ]])
    --//アキラ

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0143.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "Eh? S-sorry, Akira! Was the online call from earlier still connected?" ]])
    --//リラ

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0202.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yeah. I heard everything perfectly. I could picture you flirting with your boyfriend, looking so happy with that goofy smile." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0144.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "S-sorry about that. And it’s not like I have a boyfriend. Attending an all-girls school and working part-time after classes, there’s no way I’d have one." ]])
    --//リラ

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0145.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "W-well... I do hope I could have one someday though." ]])
    -- //リラ

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0203.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Tch. That’s why social otaku like you annoy me. May you eternally explode in frustration." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0146.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "S-says who? You’re living under the same roof with the guy you like, aren’t you?" ]])
    --//リラ

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0147.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "You’re way more of a normie than me, do you know that?" ]])
    --//リラ

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0204.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Even living under the same roof, nothing happens, you know? Do you understand the pain of being completely off the romantic radar...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0205.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Like today, while I’m secretly on an online call in my room, this person is texting someone on their phone..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0206.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s definitely some girl from school... Ugh, this is depressing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0148.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "T-that’s sad... Looks like the path to our first boyfriends is going to be rough for both of us..." ]])
    --//リラ

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0207.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Hmph. For now, I’m going for the champion’s glory over a boyfriend." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0208.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Once I’m ready, the two of us will dive back into the online world together." ]])

    --//CG：LINE風画面（ミナトとリコの会話④）
    PLAY_SE("SEb019.wav")
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI033a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//SE：LINEの通知音
--PLAY_SE("SEb019.wav")
--WAIT(600)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0149.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Riko?】
 "Ah. Sorry. I just got a reply from him, so wait a moment." ]])
    --//リラ

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0209.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "U-um, should I wingman you, you normie..."]])
    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP02_17")
end
